column4: hi i am very new to this os and i am confused as hell are there any dedicated rooms here where i can ask a few questions please?
wellit comes up with ubuntu 7.4 i have loaded and installed as per the instructions....i wish to know how do i defrag my harddrives,and how do i download  the new gnowm?
you don't need to defrag the ubuntu drives, they defrag themselves automagically.
